name: Human Invasion
description:
Game created during GamesPlusJam 2. 

Main theme for this project was "space" - I wanted to make a game in space, controlled mainly by space...bar :)  

And here it is - maybe not a game, but start project done in few days, for future improvement. There is still much work to do with that, but I think it's always a great start and...hey...it's finished :D
